This game is a must have you desire to play the classics. The weapons are tweaked to near perfection and the maps are perfect ( until you get to zen and interloper) and the enemies have predictable attacks which means dying is almost always YOUR fault and not the games (unless you die to elevators or get stuck on geometry). This game has aged like cheese but is still fun to play.

Half Life is one of the best gaming experience, the game stands strong even today and the intricate design of each level is really an experience. It is not a typical run and gun game, this game pushes you to be in the mind of the protagonist Gordon Freeman and forces you to think out of the box for each problem that you come across. Even though I am full of praise for the game , the later stages of the game pushes you beyond your limit and can lead to frustrations and disappointments. The experience is rewarding and story telling is very subtle. The beauty of half life is that you can interpret the story in your own way as you clear each chapter of the story. Step into the shoes of Gordon Freeman and the beautiful story of half life.
